programme.title: Young Bill Hickok
programme.desc: The frontier hero (Roy Rogers) sings and saves Civil War gold with his sidekick (George "Gabby" Hayes).

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A New York police officer, shot and wounded by a gangster, travels to Cheyenne, Wyo., to recuperate at his family's ranch, and is surprised to find a bootlegger from New York running a speakeasy there.

programme.title: Revenge of the Virgins
programme.desc: When white settlers start to move in on their sacred grounds, a tribe of female Indians vow to do anything they can to stop them.

programme.title: Riddle Ranch
programme.desc: Bob Horton is in love Helen Riddle, but ranch owner Jim Riddle won't allow his niece to marry a lowly cowboy. Jim does let Bob ride Black King, one of his toughest horses, in a race with bandit Don Carlos, but is disappointed when Black King loses.

programme.title: Raiders of the Border
programme.desc: U.S. marshals (Johnny Mack Brown, Raymond Hatton) catch rustlers swapping cattle for Mexican jewels.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie, Lofty and Tagg (Gail Davis, Brad Johnson, Jimmy Hawkins) attend a friend's wedding and investigate the best man's murder.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) uncovers a scheme involving honest ranchers, a band of greedy crooks and a valuable oil pool. With Monte Blue, Jim Bannon.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A contractor agrees to deliver government gun-powder to Geronimo.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie's childhood sweetheart has become an outlaw, the Waco Kid.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A clumsy fortune-hunter doubles for a notorious gunfighter.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: An outlaw (Myron Healey) poses as a marshal in an attempt to free his brother from jail. With Paul McGuire, Gail Davis.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) challenges a mine owner's spoiled rich daughter (Maura Murphy) to a race. With Tom London.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: After being framed and serving seven years in prison, a bitter man (Harry Lauter) returns to town. With Gail Davis.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie, Lofty and Tagg (Gail Davis, Brad Johnson, Jimmy Hawkins) step in when a store owner is killed and his young daughter is left blind. With Judy Nugent.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie becomes suspicious of Elaine Forbes, the seemingly innocent niece of a recently deceased rancher.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Outlaw Vic Carver (Robert B. Williams) seeks revenge against Sheriff MacTavish (Kenneth MacDonald) for sending him to jail.

programme.title: Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie (Gail Davis) races to save her retired mentor (Stanley Andrews) from a suicide mission with a merciless young gunman. With Ric Vallin.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A stageline driver is framed in the looting of strongboxes by the stageline owner and freighter.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: After a woman is wrongfully jailed, Cisco and Pancho plan to trap the real murderer.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho prove that an office manager and his followers are murderers.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A gambler's thugs beat up a crusading newspaperman.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A dog leads Cisco and Pancho to his murdered master's gold mine where they become trapped by the victim's killers.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco proves that the man being held in jail on a murder charge is not the actual murderer.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A respectable businessman traps an elderly man into a rustling ring scheme that Pancho and Cisco later discover.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho set out to prove that a notorious outlaw has murdered a U.S. marshal.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho capture a notorious bank robber after falling for a trap set by the criminal's sister.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho attempt to convince a freighting company owner that her competitor did not steal from her wagons.

programme.title: Jesse James Rides Again
programme.desc: On the run from the law over false charges, Jesse James and his friend find refuge in a small town threatened by a gang trying to claim the oil deposits beneath it. While there, he meets a pretty woman and father who are in danger.

programme.title: West of the Divide
programme.desc: Ted and Dusty infiltrate a band of outlaws to get close to Mr. Gentry, the man who murdered Ted's father.

programme.title: Clearing the Range
programme.desc: A cowboy (Hoot Gibson) rides by night to catch the man who killed his brother.

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid (Jack Buetel), Doc Holliday (Walter Huston) and Pat Garrett hang out with a hussy (Jane Russell).

programme.title: Fast Bullets
programme.desc: Two Texas Rangers (Tom Tyler, Rex Lease) nab smugglers and rescue a woman (Margaret Nearing) from a runaway wagon.
